response.job_title: Product Marketing Manager Image Guided Therapy
response.summary:
Telecommunication Engineered with a great knowledge in computers, Marketing & sales. Great experience in group coordination & technical/sales support to sales force. I am an enthusiastic and analytical persons who seeks perfection in every task.

Last 17 years, I have being working in healthcare, always linked to diagnostic imaging. Throughout my career, I worked with my customers to highlight the latest solutions and innovations in image diagnosis to facilitate workflows and patients outcome. I have worked with computed tomography solutions, clinical informatics and now I am focused on image-guided therapy with the aim of improving the patient's and healthcare professional's experience through process efficiency and systems integration.
response.skills: Strategy, Management, Telecommunications, Mobile Devices, Business Strategy, Business Development, Training, Marketing Strategy, Sales Operations, Marketing, Medical Devices, Leadership, Sales, IP, Testing

profile_positions.description:
•	Design of configured / customized solutions across all Philips Cardiology solutions for customers
•	Helps sales force to boost the business in general and provide clinical and technical information on the solutions that best suit customers.
•	Training sales force in cardiology solutions.
•	Participation in the definition and control of the implementation of commercial policy and pricing strategy.
•	Inform and recommend to customers the latest technological innovations developed.
•	Define the product's marketing strategy.
•	Preparation and delivery of business forecasts on a monthly basis through the precise management of opportunities.
•	Assessment of the market and changes in the industry
•	Responsible for the development and management of the modality's product portfolio, as well as defining the Marketing strategy
profile_positions.title: Cardiology Solutions Lead

company.name: Philips
company.description:
Over the past decade we have transformed into a focused leader in health technology.

At Philips, our purpose is to improve people’s health and well-being through meaningful innovation. We aim to improve 2.5 billion lives per year by 2030, including 400 million in underserved communities. 

We see healthcare as a connected whole. Helping people to live healthily and prevent disease. Giving clinicians the tools they need to make a precision diagnosis and deliver personalized treatment. Aiding the patient's recovery at home in the community. All supported by a seamless flow of data.

As a technology company, we – and our brand licensees – innovate for people with one consistent belief: there’s always a way to make life better.


Visit our website: http://www.philips.com/
Follow our social media house rules https://www.philips.com/a-w/about-philips/social-media.html
